personal.bio: Master's in Computer Science from Fudan University. Specialized in RAG systems, LLM applications, and reinforcement learning. Proven track record in reducing AI hallucinations by 73% and improving system accuracy by 37%.

achievements: RAG System Development: Built end-to-end pipeline with Query Understanding → Retrieval → Re-ranking → Generation → Self-Verification. Reduced hallucinations by 73% and improved Hit@5 accuracy by 37% compared to Naive RAG

Generation Optimization: Created prompt template library for customer service, reports, and FAQs. Implemented answer-context similarity checks, self-consistency verification, and risk filtering for traceable outputs
Query Understanding: Designed intent classification, NER extraction, and query rewriting/expansion modules with multi-turn coreference resolution
Hybrid Retrieval: Implemented Dense + BM25 hybrid recall strategy with BGE re-ranking and metadata filtering (source, time, type)
End-to-End Intelligence Optimization: Analyzed user behavior (view, click, add-to-cart) for in-store dishes. Built new recall pipeline, increasing in-box term UV_CTR by 13% and search DAU by 0.08%
Term Service Chain Optimization: Applied sample attribution and other optimization techniques, improving in-box term UV_CTR by 2.07%, search discovery UV_CTR by 0.33%, and search DAU by 0.07%
Data Analysis: Collected and analyzed large-scale user behavior data to optimize recommendation and search strategies
